skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Shigure, ship number 2 of the Shiratsuyu-class. I worked pretty hard in the First Fleet before I was reassigned to the Second Fleet and participated in the fated Battle of Leyte Gulf... I was the sole survivor, but I'll never forget the bravery everyone showed in that battle... Yamashiro... Fusou... how I miss you...
skins.acquisition: I'm Shigure, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer. I don't wanna brag, but I've got the Goddess of Luck watching over me~ Heheh, it's about time people acknowledged that luck is also a part of one's strength?
skins.login: Commander! You're late! Go get ready~ I've been waiting for you.
skins.details: Stupid Commander! Look at me again and I'll bite you!
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's so peaceful... How about we play a game of luck?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The gods seem to really love me, so hurry up and shower me with compliments?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You don't look too good. How about a torpedo to cheer you up?
skins.secretaryTouch: Stop touching me! Don't blame me if something blows up!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, let's play a game. I'll give you 5 minutes and if you haven't been caught by the police at that point then I'll withdraw my report~

skins.shipDescription: Heheh~ Retrofitting the mighty Shigure proves that you are quite perceptive! Aren't you glad that you get to rely on me more, you lucky idiot of a commander~?
skins.acquisition: Heheh~ Retrofitting the mighty Shigure proves that you are quite perceptive! Aren't you glad that you get to rely on me more, you lucky idiot of a commander~?
skins.login: So what are we doing today? Trying your luck against mine? Very well~ Since you insist, even though you know you're gonna lose, dummy?
skins.details: What are you looking at? Well, you big idiot?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'll head over and help you out later, Yamashiro! Oh, and I'll bring the Commander too, 'cause why not!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Shiratsuyu really got lost again? You can never get any rest with that girl around... Come on, Commander, we're going looking for her.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Aren't my nails super cute? Hah hah hah! By the by, I'm the one always painting Yuudachi's nails and making them look pretty! Now tell Shigure how awesome she is?
skins.secretaryTouch: Heheh~! Well, well, what do you think you're doing? Com-man-der?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Because the mighty Shigure is such a benevolent girl, all I've done is report what you did. Hahaha! Time to see how long you can evade capture?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: What are you doing?! Don't lump me together with that dumb Yukikaze!

skins.shipDescription: Stupid Commander, I'm not a damn submarine! Do you wanna get hit in the face with an oxygen torpedo?
skins.acquisition: Stupid Commander, I'm not a damn submarine! Do you wanna get hit in the face with an oxygen torpedo?
skins.details: You thought I wouldn't bite you just because you complimented my swimsuit? *Hiss*
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'll just absorb some seawater with my tail, and then... Pow! Oh dear~ You're totally drenched, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yamashiro gave me this little rose! If you thought I'd give it to you, think again!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Yamashiro, just ignore that stupid Commander, come play beach volleyball with me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't touch my ears, I'm ticklish there!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wahh! You scared off the fish I'd caught with my tail! Commander, you idiot!

skins.shipDescription: Oh my. Commander, you must be pretty lucky to bump into me here, hehe~ Since you're here, you can have the privilege of being my escort tonight. Now, be grateful~?
skins.acquisition: Oh my. Commander, you must be pretty lucky to bump into me here, hehe~ Since you're here, you can have the privilege of being my escort tonight. Now, be grateful~?
skins.login: You came at a good time, Commander! This is where the highlight of the party begins!
skins.details: Yamashiro warned me not to pull any weird tricks, and she's treating me like I don't know that already... If anything, she's the one we should worry about...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What's with that spinning gaze of yours? I'm right over here!
skins.secretaryIdle2: What the hell, Yuudachi! At least try to mind your table manners!
skins.secretaryIdle3: There'll be a raffle? Hmph, this time I'll defeat that stupid Yukikaze!
skins.secretaryTouch: Look at how you're blushing, Commander! Have you fallen head over heels for me? Heheheh~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! Y-you moronic commander! Pay attention to your footwork!
